posts.post_title: What did he say or do??
posts.post_content: How about when he said go f*** yourself? What a nice and proper way to resolve a disagreement.

Certainly.....Peter complains about every T206 thread put on the board, yet continues to post on every thread pertaining to T206's. He's a real pain in the ass and a D-BAG. I have no interest in certain cards and can refrain from commenting, but will read to gather info about that subject. 

If this is so hard to comprehend then, well, sorry. I really think the only thing that makes Little Pete happy is bitching about T206 threads. Telling me to go fuk myself really takes the cake. If you are his buddy, well tell him to give me a call and we will see if we can have a beer or three and see what happens.

Lots of miles from a innocent post wanting to buy some great cards.

Rawn

[quote name="CMIZ5290" post=1014959]How about when he said go f*** yourself? What a nice and proper way to resolve a disagreement.[/QUOTE]

Pete was being funny, he never even said anything that warranted the use of "D-BAG"!

This thread has been bumped enough. Hopefully the original poster gets some good spotlight for his t206 request.
Petey is always trying to be funny, but it mainly comes across as sarcastic as hell. He needs to get a life.....

OK well now let's line up on sides. I'll call out Peter on his attitude. I attack when called out. Call me an idiot, tell me to GFY, that's not funny. STFU PETE and all supporters of him.

Again, thanks for the calls and emails,

" *** WoW *** " 

Getting Back on the Subject... Hey Rawn! 
I Have a Nice 5 Card SOVERIGN LoT uP Fir Sale... & I Just Lowered the Price!

Any Interest Please Pm me...

As Always...

You know guys...this is freakin' ridiculous!  Yes...I can be a sarcastic wise ass...and yes...I understand that over the internet it's easy to misconstrue the meaning of what one is trying to say.   

And yes I realize that I rub some people the wrong way...just like ignoring a thread...or a tv show...if u dont like me...ignore me!

We all share a common passion...a common love...which is kinda rare in this world...I have no desire to fight with anyone on here.

I am usually just trying to be funny...I mean no harm...I will make an effort to be a little less sarcastic...I will do my best to not behave in a "dick-ish" manner.

Now someone get this thread starter some bloody T206's already!

Holy Crap!!! Pete finally gets the fact that he's not funny. Now back to our regularally schedueled programming minus the D-bag interruptions.

Where's the next T206 thread?

Rawn
i may not be funny...to you...but at least I can spell.
